turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm okay. I could use a cup of coffee that shake the cobwebs out though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing and where did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get it from Peet's in Los Gatos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. can I have a cross street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me think. I think It's I thinks it's on Blossom Hill and I'm not sure of the cross street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ah found it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, cool. Yeah, I just didn't know. It's kind of nearer a few other food places but.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a sugar-free vanilla latte. Can you make it a a medium?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want that with skimmed milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any add ons or syrups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, no other syrups or anything. Just Just the sugar-free vanilla latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a skim sugar free vanilla latte, sized medium from the Peets on Blossum HIll in los gatos.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're a life saver.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Happy to help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You take care and drive safe now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Yeah.

items.name: No, no other syrups or anyth
